title: sm.drydowns.models: DES and muSEC models for soil moisture drydowns (R)

creators.name: Martini, Tommaso
creators.affiliation: Interuniversity Department of Regional and Urban Studies and Planning (DIST), University of Turin (UniTo), Italy

creators.name: Olivero, Aurora
creators.affiliation: Interuniversity Department of Regional and Urban Studies and Planning (DIST), University of Turin (UniTo), Italy

description: Reference implementation in R of two simplified hydrological models for soil moisture drydowns: the desorptivity-based model (DES) and the multilayer Surface Evaporative Capacitance extension (muSEC), presented in the associated manuscript by Martini and Olivero et al. (2025).
notes: This record corresponds to the versioned release of the R package 'sm.drydowns.models', which implements the DES and muSEC soil moisture drydown models. It provides the exact codebase used to reproduce simulations and figures in the associated publication. A new DOI will be automatically minted by Zenodo upon each GitHub release and linked to this concept DOI.
